name: 39 Days to Mars
description: Embark on the 19th century's most unreliable spaceship in this 2 player couch co-op adventure. 39 Days to Mars is a unique game designed to be played with a friend, where both players have important roles in the expedition. Solo players are aided by the computer-controlled ship's cat.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.7 GHz Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 650 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad(s) recommended
